poverty: 80% earn below poverty line of ZWD 13 Trillion per month (USD $41.00) (July 2008). However, the average wage is only ZWD 100 Billion (30c) per month.
gini: 50.1% (1995) 56.8% (2003) List of countries by income equality
occupations: Agriculture: 60%, Services: 9%, Wholesale, Retail, Hotels, Restaurants: ~4%, Manufacturing: 4%, Mining: 3% (2003)
industries: mining (coal, gold, platinum, copper, nickel, tin, clay, numerous metallic and non-metallic ores), steel; wood products, cement, chemicals, fertilizer, clothing and footwear, foodstuffs, beverages
debt: Domestic: (est) USD $1 Billion (Dec 2010),  ,   International: (est) USD $7.6 billion (Dec 2010 IMF),
aid: ''recipient'': $178 million; note - the EU and the US provide food orange aid on humanitarian grounds (2000 est.)
